Posts.Content: anujain2102 wrote: MY MOTHER IS SUFFERING FROM CA BREAST SINCE 2004.She is tripple negative . SHE HAVE BEEN RECEIVED 2 CYCLES OF CAP REGIME then BCT surgery then 3 cycles of cap regime and then 25+6 fractions of linear accelarator radiation. In 2007 she got local recurrence and adviced for paclitaxel and carboplatin 5 cycles. In 2010 again ther was locoreigional recurrence and she have been adviced for orally capecitabine1500mg for 6 cycles, but due side effects she have taken only 2 cycles. IN feb2011 there is increase in tumor size and pain in rt upper limb because of rt brachial plxopathy. And now she has been advised for docetaxel and carboplatin 6 cycles. she have took 5 cycles of above and on repeat CT there was increase in tumor and dr has advised to stop this regime and go for gemcitabine cisplatin regime. NOw my mother is very resistant to take chemotherapy now . IS CK IS TREATMENT OPTION FOR HER? ther no mets anywhere in body at present. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: cyber knife for ca breast anujain2102 anujain2102
